folder.name: 10. Recovery Catalog
folder.tooltip: Recovery Catalog - Connect to RMAN Catalog

query.sql:
/* --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select distinct NAME , DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , RESETLOGS_TIME from rman.RC_DATABASE a where exists ( select 'X' from rman.RC_DATABASE b where a.name = b.name having ( a.RESETLOGS_TIME = max(b.RESETLOGS_TIME) ) group by b.name ) order by NAME */
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select distinct a.NAME , a.DBID , a.DB_KEY , a.DBINC_KEY , a.RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , a.RESETLOGS_TIME , Max(b.start_time) LAST_BACKUP from rman.RC_DATABASE a , rman.RC_RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS b where a.NAME = b.DB_NAME AND A.DB_KEY = b.DB_KEY AND --b.start_time > to_date(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')||'-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') b.start_time > trunc(sysdate) - 91 /*AND exists ( select 'X' from rman.RC_DATABASE b where a.name = b.name having ( a.RESETLOGS_TIME = max(b.RESETLOGS_TIME) ) group by b.name ) */ Group by a.NAME , a.DBID , a.DB_KEY , a.DBINC_KEY , a.RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , a.RESETLOGS_TIME order by LAST_BACKUP desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , input_type , status , start_time , end_time /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED -- can be used as an example/template , CASE WHEN (end_time-start_time) is null then ' ' WHEN (end_time-start_time) > 1 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(end_time-start_time),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((end_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((end_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME */ , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) > 24*3600 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ELAPSED_SECONDS/(24*3600)),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME , CASE WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN input_bytes >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(input_bytes,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END input_bytes --, input_bytes/1048576 Read_MB , CASE WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN output_bytes >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(output_bytes,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END output_bytes --, output_bytes/1048576 Write_MB from rman.RC_RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS where --DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND input_type = 'DB FULL' AND start_time > trunc(sysdate)-60 order by start_time desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , input_type , status , start_time , end_time /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED -- can be used as an example/template , CASE WHEN (end_time-start_time) is null then ' ' WHEN (end_time-start_time) > 1 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(end_time-start_time),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((end_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((end_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((end_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME */ , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) > 24*3600 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ELAPSED_SECONDS/(24*3600)),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME , CASE WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN input_bytes >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN input_bytes >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(input_bytes/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(input_bytes,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END input_bytes --, input_bytes/1048576 Read_MB , CASE WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN output_bytes >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(output_bytes,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END output_bytes --, output_bytes/1048576 Write_MB from rman.RC_RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND input_type = 'ARCHIVELOG' AND start_time > trunc(sysdate) - 7 order by start_time desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --Backup Sets select d.DB_NAME , s.DB_ID , s.DB_KEY , d.file# --, s.set_stamp --, s.set_count , decode(s.BACKUP_TYPE, 'D', 'DATABASE', 'I', 'INCREMENTAL', 'L', 'ARCHIVELOG', s.BACKUP_TYPE) BACKUP_TYPE --, s.pieces , s.start_time , s.completion_time /* DO NOT DELETE EVEN IF IT IS COMMENTED -- can be used as an example/template , CASE WHEN (completion_time-start_time) is null then ' ' WHEN (completion_time-start_time) > 1 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(completion_time-start_time),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((completion_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((completion_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((completion_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((completion_time-start_time)*24),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((completion_time-start_time)*24*60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((completion_time-start_time)*24*60*60),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME */ , CASE WHEN (s.ELAPSED_SECONDS) is null then ' ' WHEN (s.ELAPSED_SECONDS) > 24*3600 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(s.ELAPSED_SECONDS/(24*3600)),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((s.ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME , s.controlfile_included , d.checkpoint_change# , d.CREATION_CHANGE# , d.CREATION_TIME , d.RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , d.RESETLOGS_TIME from rman.rc_backup_set s , rman.rc_backup_datafile d where DB_NAME = :NAME AND s.DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND s.set_stamp = d.set_stamp AND s.set_count = d.set_count AND s.start_time > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by file# , s.completion_time

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , DB_ID , DB_KEY , decode(BACKUP_TYPE, 'D', 'DATABASE', 'I', 'INCREMENTAL', 'L', 'ARCHIVELOG', BACKUP_TYPE) BACKUP_TYPE , DEVICE_TYPE , MEDIA , START_TIME , COMPLETION_TIME --, ELAPSED_SECONDS , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) > 24*3600 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ELAPSED_SECONDS/(24*3600)),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME , decode(STATUS, 'A', 'AVAILABLE', STATUS) STATUS , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , TAG --, SESSION_KEY --, SESSION_RECID --, SESSION_STAMP --, BP_KEY --, RECID --, STAMP --, BS_KEY --, SET_STAMP --, SET_COUNT --, PIECE# --, COPY# , HANDLE , INCREMENTAL_LEVEL --, COMMENTS --, MEDIA_POOL --, CONCUR , IS_RECOVERY_DEST_FILE --, RSR_KEY , COMPRESSED --, SITE_KEY , ENCRYPTED --, BACKED_BY_OSB , PIECES_PER_SET --, SIZE_BYTES_DISPLAY from rman.RC_BACKUP_PIECE_DETAILS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND START_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by BACKUP_TYPE , START_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --Datafiles select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , decode(BACKUP_TYPE, 'D', 'DATABASE', 'I', 'INCREMENTAL', 'L', 'ARCHIVELOG', BACKUP_TYPE) BACKUP_TYPE , FILE# , completion_time , CASE WHEN block_size*datafile_blocks >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*datafile_blocks/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN block_size*datafile_blocks >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*datafile_blocks/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN block_size*datafile_blocks >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*datafile_blocks/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN block_size*datafile_blocks >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*datafile_blocks/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN block_size*datafile_blocks >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*datafile_blocks/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(block_size*datafile_blocks,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END Total_Size --, trunc(block_size*datafile_blocks/1048576) Total_Size , CASE WHEN block_size*blocks >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*blocks/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN block_size*blocks >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*blocks/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN block_size*blocks >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*blocks/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN block_size*blocks >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*blocks/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN block_size*blocks >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(block_size*blocks/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(block_size*blocks,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END Backup_Size --, trunc(block_size*blocks/1048576) Backup_Size , decode(STATUS, 'A', 'AVAILABLE', STATUS) STATUS , INCREMENTAL_LEVEL , PIECES , CREATION_CHANGE# , CREATION_TIME , RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , RESETLOGS_TIME , INCREMENTAL_CHANGE# , checkpoint_change# , resetlogs_change# from rman.rc_backup_datafile where --file#=1 and DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND trunc(completion_time) > trunc(sysdate)-1 order by FILE# , completion_time desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , TS# , NAME , CREATION_CHANGE# , CREATION_TIME , DROP_CHANGE# , DROP_TIME , INCLUDED_IN_DATABASE_BACKUP , BIGFILE , TEMPORARY , ENCRYPT_IN_BACKUP --, PLUGIN_CHANGE# from rman.RC_TABLESPACE where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by TS#

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --Control File select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , BCF_KEY --, RECID --, STAMP --, BS_KEY --, SET_STAMP -- SET_COUNT , RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , RESETLOGS_TIME , CHECKPOINT_CHANGE# , CHECKPOINT_TIME , CREATION_TIME , BLOCK_SIZE , OLDEST_OFFLINE_RANGE , decode(STATUS, 'A', 'AVAILABLE', STATUS) STATUS --, BS_RECID --, BS_STAMP --, BS_LEVEL , COMPLETION_TIME , CONTROLFILE_TYPE , BLOCKS , AUTOBACKUP_DATE , AUTOBACKUP_SEQUENCE from rman.RC_BACKUP_CONTROLFILE where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND COMPLETION_TIME > trunc(sysdate)-7 order by COMPLETION_TIME desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , THREAD# , GROUP# , NAME , SITE_KEY , CASE WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES , TYPE from rman.RC_REDO_LOG where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY --AND --DB_INCKEY = :DB_INCKEY order by THREAD# , GROUP# , NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , BTYPE , BTYPE_KEY --, SESSION_KEY --, SESSION_RECID --, SESSION_STAMP --, ID1 --, ID2 , THREAD# , SEQUENCE# , RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , RESETLOGS_TIME , FIRST_CHANGE# , FIRST_TIME , NEXT_CHANGE# , NEXT_TIME , CASE WHEN FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN FILESIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FILESIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN FILESIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FILESIZE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FILESIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FILESIZE --, FILESIZE , COMPRESSION_RATIO --, FILESIZE_DISPLAY from rman.RC_BACKUP_ARCHIVELOG_DETAILS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND FIRST_TIME > trunc(sysdate)-1 order by THREAD# , SEQUENCE# DESC , FIRST_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY --, RECID --, STAMP , THREAD# , SEQUENCE# , FIRST_CHANGE# , FIRST_TIME , NEXT_CHANGE# , CLEARED from rman.RC_LOG_HISTORY where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND FIRST_TIME > trunc(sysdate)-1 order by FIRST_TIME desc , THREAD# , SEQUENCE# , FIRST_CHANGE# , NEXT_CHANGE#

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select distinct sd.DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , sd.DB_KEY , sd.MODIFICATION_TIME , sd.FILESIZE_DISPLAY --, s.COMPLETION_TIME from rman.RC_BACKUP_SPFILE_DETAILS SD , rman.RC_BACKUP_SPFILE s where --s.BS_KEY = sd.BS_KEY AND Sd.MODIFICATION_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 AND sd.DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND s.DB_UNIQUE_NAME = SD.DB_NAME AND s.DB_UNIQUE_NAME = :NAME order by sd.MODIFICATION_TIME /* select distinct SD.DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , S.DB_KEY --, S.BSF_KEY --, S.RECID --, S.STAMP , decode(S.STATUS, 'A', 'AVAILABLE', S.STATUS) STATUS --, S.BS_RECID --, S.BS_STAMP , S.COMPLETION_TIME --, S.BYTES --, SD.SESSION_KEY --, SD.SESSION_RECID --, SD.SESSION_STAMP --, SD.BS_KEY --, SD.SET_STAMP --, SD.SET_COUNT , SD.MODIFICATION_TIME , CASE WHEN SD.FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SD.FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN SD.FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SD.FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN SD.FILESIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SD.FILESIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN SD.FILESIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SD.FILESIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN SD.FILESIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(SD.FILESIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(SD.FILESIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FILESIZE --, SD.FILESIZE --, SD.FILESIZE_DISPLAY --, SS.NUM_FILES_BACKED --, SS.NUM_DISTINCT_FILES_BACKED --, SS.MIN_MODIFICATION_TIME --, SS.MAX_MODIFICATION_TIME --, SS.INPUT_BYTES --, SS.INPUT_BYTES_DISPLAY from RC_BACKUP_SPFILE s , RC_BACKUP_SPFILE_DETAILS sd where sd.MODIFICATION_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 AND SD.DB_NAME = s.DB_UNIQUE_NAME AND SD.DB_NAME = :NAME */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --Incarnations select NAME , DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY, RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , RESETLOGS_TIME , CURRENT_INCARNATION , PARENT_DBINC_KEY , PRIOR_RESETLOGS_CHANGE# , PRIOR_RESETLOGS_TIME , STATUS from rman.RC_DATABASE_INCARNATION where NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by RESETLOGS_TIME , CURRENT_INCARNATION
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'This feature is available in 11.2.0.4 and later releases' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_UNIQUE_NAME DATABASE , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , CONF# , NAME , VALUE , SITE_KEY from rman.RC_RMAN_CONFIGURATION where DB_UNIQUE_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by CONF# , NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) Select NAME , :DBID DBID , :DB_KEY DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , RECID , STAMP , SITE_KEY , RESTORE_POINT_TIME , CREATION_TIME , SCN , LONG_TERM , PRESERVED , GUARANTEE_FLASHBACK_DATABASE from rman.RC_RESTORE_POINT where NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by CREATION_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY --, RECID --, STAMP --, BS_KEY --, SET_STAMP --, SET_COUNT , PIECE# --, BDF_KEY --, BDF_RECID --, BDF_STAMP , FILE# , CREATION_CHANGE# , BLOCK# , BLOCKS , CORRUPTION_CHANGE# , MARKED_CORRUPT , CORRUPTION_TYPE from rman.RC_BACKUP_CORRUPTION where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by FILE#

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select :NAME DB_NAME , :DBID DBID , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , FILE# , BLOCK# , BLOCKS , CORRUPTION_CHANGE# , CORRUPTION_TYPE from rman.RC_DATABASE_BLOCK_CORRUPTION where DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND DBINC_KEY = :DBINC_KEY order by FILE#

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select distinct :NAME NAME , DB_KEY --, BS_RECID --, BS_STAMP , SET_STAMP , SET_COUNT --, BCK_TYPE --, INCR_LEVEL --, PIECES --, trunc(START_TIME) START_TIME , substr(trunc(COMPLETION_TIME), 1, 15) COMPLETION_TIME --, to_char(bs.COMPLETION_TIME, 'DY YYYY-MM-DD') COMPLETION_TIME , decode(STATUS, 'A', 'AVAILABLE','D', 'DELETED', 'O', 'OBSOLETE') STATUS --, CONTROLFILE_INCLUDED --, INPUT_FILE_SCAN_ONLY --, KEEP_OPTIONS --, KEEP_UNTIL --, BLOCK_SIZE --, SITE_KEY --, MULTI_SECTION from rman.BS where DB_KEY = :DB_KEY order by COMPLETION_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , DB_KEY , DBINC_KEY , STATUS , START_TIME , END_TIME , ROW_TYPE , ROW_LEVEL , OPERATION , RECID , STAMP , RSR_KEY , PARENT_KEY , SESSION_KEY , COMMAND_ID , MBYTES_PROCESSED , JOB_KEY , INPUT_BYTES , OUTPUT_BYTES , OPTIMIZED , OBJECT_TYPE , SESSION_RECID , SESSION_STAMP , OUTPUT_DEVICE_TYPE , SITE_KEY , OSB_ALLOCATED from rman.RC_RMAN_STATUS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND END_TIME > trunc(sysdate)-7 --STATUS not in ('COMPLETED', 'COMPLETED WITH ERRORS', 'FAILED') order by START_TIME DESC
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT * FROM rman.rcver

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , input_type , status , trunc(start_time) start_time , to_char(start_time, 'Day') "DAY" --, end_time /* , CASE WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) is null then ' ' WHEN (ELAPSED_SECONDS) > 24*3600 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ELAPSED_SECONDS/(24*3600)),'FM90') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60/60),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)/60),60)),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(((ELAPSED_SECONDS)),60),'FM00.00') || 's' END ELAPSED_TIME */ , CASE WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(input_bytes),'FM9000.00') || ' ' END daily_arch , CASE WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/1024/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(input_bytes)/24,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END hourly_average --, input_bytes/1048576 Read_MB /* , CASE WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN output_bytes >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN output_bytes >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(output_bytes/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(output_bytes,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END output_bytes --, output_bytes/1048576 Write_MB */ , round(AVG(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_AVG_GB , round(MAX(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MAX_GB , round(MIN(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MIN_GB from rman.RC_RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND input_type = 'ARCHIVELOG' AND start_time > trunc(sysdate) - 31 group by DB_NAME , input_type , status , trunc(start_time) , to_char(start_time, 'Day') order by trunc(start_time)

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select DB_NAME , input_type , status , trunc(start_time) start_time , to_char(start_time, 'Day') "DAY" , CASE WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(input_bytes) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(input_bytes),'FM9000.00') || ' ' END daily_arch , CASE WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' PB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/(1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(input_bytes)/24 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(input_bytes)/1024/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(input_bytes)/24,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END hourly_average , round(AVG(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_AVG_GB , round(MAX(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MAX_GB , round(MIN(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MIN_GB from rman.RC_RMAN_BACKUP_JOB_DETAILS where DB_NAME = :NAME AND DB_KEY = :DB_KEY AND input_type = 'ARCHIVELOG' AND start_time > trunc(sysdate) - 31 group by DB_NAME , input_type , status , trunc(start_time) , to_char(start_time, 'Day') order by trunc(start_time)

display.name: 11. RMAN Duplicate
display.description: Source DB: SDPRD (target) Target DB: SDDEV (auxiliary)

query.sql: rman target SYS/SHS#N2CA0P
